string-array.name: welcomeDescription
string-array.item: Add those people who could provide support to you in an emergency by using this feature
Create events to connect your emergency contact who can follow you by using this feature
Alert your emergency contacts based on your safety plan by using this feature
Quickly call your local police department based on your set location by using this feature
Play the sound simulation to help you scare the bad guys away by using this feature
Learning as much as you can about safety can reduce your risk of injury by using this feature
